message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's split it 90/10, but only if you accept now. Otherwise, the money will be worth less next round!
Alice, that's not a fair deal. I'm proposing a 60/40 split. Let's be reasonable.
I'm willing to give you more, Bob, but not that much!  Let's split it 80/20 this time. We both get more than before, and the value is still decreasing for you.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this now.  Any more rounds and we both lose out significantly.
